notamDefinitions.text: PILOTS MAY REQUEST RWY 16R FOR DEPARTURE.
PILOTS MAY REQUEST RWY 34L FOR DEPARTURE.

A-CDM IN USE. SUMBIT YOUR TOBT AT VACDM.VATITA.NET.
STANDARD 1 MEANS CONTINUE TAXI VIA TWY D, HOLD SHORT OF TWY EG, AND MONITOR FIUME GROUND ON FREQUENCY 121.900.
